newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Filipino officials told to eat passion - killing papaya.
newsitem.headline: Filipino officials told to eat passion - killing papaya.

text.p: Philippine labour department officials posted abroad to look after Filipino migrant workers are being advised to eat lots of papaya if they find it hard to control their sexual urges.

Overseas Workers Welfare Administration chief Wilhelm Soriano said on Monday that he had advised his officers to resort to the tropical fruit after reports that some had become sexually involved with people they were supposed to be counselling.
"Papaya has that element called papase, which apparently pacifies your urges," Soriano told Reuters.
